attributes.action: To end this experimental road closure in Loughborough junction.
attributes.additional_details: It is an absolute inconvenience, no one has thought about the residents and how it has affected our lives. There was little to no reason as to why this is occurring and the residents received a very brief and undetailed warning. One questions, if this would happen in a none council estate area, what's certain is that it can not remain like this.
attributes.background: This experimental road closure has blocked residents of Loughborough in the estate! It has been made difficult to leave the area causing more congestion on quieter  back roads and more air pollution.

rejection.details:
Roads in the capital are managed either by Transport for London or by the relevant London borough. 

Information about the experimental road closures in Loughborough Junction operated by Lambeth Council is available here, together with information on the council's consultation.

Information on how to submit an e-petition to Lambeth Council is available here:
http://moderngov.lambeth.gov.uk/mgePetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1
